Quran Classes

Understanding Allah's wisdom through a modern lens.

Join us for weekly Quran classes where we analyze surahs and discuss tafsir as well as hadiths and their relevance to us. We also cover duas and reading as well. Some of our other classes are below, check out all of our classes
